snippet: The commission will study building a women’s history museum in Washington, advancing an effort that has been stalled in Congress for more than a decade.
abstract: House approves commission to study building a women’s history museum in Washington, advancing an effort that has been stalled in Congress for more than a decade.
lead_paragraph: The commission will study building a women’s history museum in Washington, advancing an effort that has been stalled in Congress for more than a decade.

headline.main: House Approves Panel to Study Building Women’s Museum
headline.print_headline: House Approves Panel to Study Women’s Museum Despite Concerns
